entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:59 PM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
